pr_title: Send preview status changes and preview data from Preview Runner to Preview Manager through TMS.

timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: Make the subscriberService a field and only call the injector.getInstance once in the startUp method. This makes it clear it is the same instance instead of relying on the singleton binding, which is not clear in this context.
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: I assume this is the persisted queue?? Where will this entry getting removed?
timeline.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText: Entry is persisted before adding to the in-memory queue. If in-memory queue is full with capacity, this entry is removed on line 104.
replies.author: sagarkapare

replies.bodyText: How about on dequeue? Does it get removed?
replies.author: chtyim
sagarkapare

timeline.bodyText: There is already a system.preview. retries, why not use that?
timeline.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText: system.preview. was added after this PR was opened.. missed updating this.
replies.author: sagarkapare

timeline.bodyText: Why use ALWAYS_TRUE? We don't want to retry if the error is non-recoverable by retry
timeline.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText: retrying now on IOException or RetryableException(i.e. ServiceUnavailableException).
replies.author: sagarkapare

timeline.bodyText: Remove this. You don't need to declare a no-op default constructor
timeline.author: chtyim
chtyim
chtyim

timeline.bodyText: Why needed? You can unset the PIPELINE_CONFIG_DIR config and have the LogPipelineLoader to check if that config exist before using it.
timeline.author: chtyim
